name: flash-fire

effect.black_white: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.
effect.black_2_white_2: will o wisp does not trigger this ability for Pokémon immune to burns.

short_effect: Protects against fire moves. Once one has been blocked, the Pokémon's own Fire moves inflict 1.5× damage until it leaves battle.

flavor_text.black_white: It powers up Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: It powers up Fire-type moves if it’s hit by one.
